mapper.select: select tb_goods_focus.id, tb_goods_focus.price, tb_goods_focus.add_date from tb_goods_focus where tb_goods_focus.is_del=0 and tb_goods_focus.consumer_id = #{consumerId}

select tb_goods_focus.id, tb_goods_focus.num_id as numId, tb_goods_focus.g_id as gId, case when tb_file_info.file_name is null then '' else concat("get-img","/",tb_file_info.file_group,"s/",tb_file_info.ref_id,"/",tb_file_info.file_name) end as gImg, tb_goods_focus.g_id as gId, case when tb_goods_focus.num !='' and tb_goods_focus.num is not null then tb_goods_focus.num else tb_goods_focus.g_name end as gName, tb_sku.sku_tob_price as currentPrice, tb_goods_focus.price as focusPrice, tb_goods_focus.update_date as addDate from tb_goods_focus left join tb_file_info on tb_file_info.ref_id=tb_goods_focus.g_id inner join tb_sku on tb_sku.g_id=tb_goods_focus.g_id where tb_file_info.file_group='goodsPic' and tb_file_info.seq=1 and tb_goods_focus.is_del=0 and tb_goods_focus.consumer_id = #{consumerId}
mapper.update: update tb_goods_focus t set t.sku_id=#{skuId}, t.num_id=#{numId} , t.num=#{num} , t.g_id=#{gId} , t.g_name=#{gName} , t.price=#{price} , t.update_date=#{updateDate}, t.consumer_id=#{consumerId}, t.add_ip=#{addIp} where t.is_del=0 and t.id = #{id}
